name: Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle
startIntroPart1: Greetings Puan Maharani, leader of the largest party in Indonesia! Your cadres have been waiting for a long time. Decades have passed since your party was founded from the merger of several other large parties.
startIntroPart2: Even though your party is currently on the verge of splitting up, the greatness of your party will not be lost in time. Can you bring your party back to its former glory?
declaringWar: It's time for the bulls to return to their time
attacked: You've played with the bull, now feel the horns!!
introduction: Welcome to the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the largest party in Indonesia.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
